concept.definition: The service or product referred to by this FormularyItem is in active use within the drug database or inventory system.
The service or product referred to by this FormularyItem was entered in error within the drug database or inventory system.
The service or product referred to by this FormularyItem is not in active use within the drug database or inventory system.

text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/formularyitem-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
active ActiveThe service or product referred to by this FormularyItem is in active use within the drug database or inventory system.
entered-in-error Entered in ErrorThe service or product referred to by this FormularyItem was entered in error within the drug database or inventory system.
inactive InactiveThe service or product referred to by this FormularyItem is not in active use within the drug database or inventory system.
